      • setUrl

        public void setUrl(java.lang.String nameImage)
        Description copied from interface: IImageController
        Set url property.
        Image with name equals to nameImage must to exist in images folder, if exist two images with same name, nameImage must to carry file extension.
        Specified by:
        setUrl in interface IImageController
        Parameters:
        nameImage - Name of image file with or without file extension.
        See Also:
        ImageExtensions
